tool_description:
Rocketium's video creation API enables businesses to automate bulk video creation. Devs can use this API to make videos from a series of images, clips, some text, music, and voice-over. Though this API is mostly used by e-commerce and retail businesses, folks from marketing agencies, online news and media houses, real estate, event management, hospitality, FMCG, and travel also benefit by making videos in bulk. 

This API is most commonly used to make videos for:
• personalized sales and m...
name: Rocketium
title: Rocketium

api_list.name: Retrieve Video
api_list.description: Once your video is created, you can easily retrieve it with a simple API call.

api_list.name: Retrieve Themes
api_list.description: This API returns themes associated with your account and public themes available to all users.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rocketium_developers-rocketium-video-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/themes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketium_developers-rocketium-video-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rocketium_developers-rocketium-video-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/themes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketium_developers-rocketium-video-v1.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
